entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 10:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: ESE 68 km/h gust 79 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Risk of a thundershower late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to drizzle or showers late this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
